mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(GROUP_ID) FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE LOWER(GROUP_NAME) = LOWER(#{grpName}) AND STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND GROUP_ID = ${groupId} AND STATUS = 1

SELECT F.GRP_FEED_NO, F.GRP_FEED_CONTENT, F.GRP_FEED_WD, F.GRP_FEED_SETTING, F.GRP_FEED_ID, M.PROFILE, COUNT(C.GRP_FEED_NO) AS GRP_COMMENT_COUNT, COUNT(L.GRP_FEED_NO) AS GRP_FEED_LIKE_COUNT FROM GRP_FEED F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON F.GRP_FEED_ID = M.ID LEFT JOIN GRP_FEED_LIKE L ON F.GRP_FEED_NO = L.GRP_FEED_NO LEFT JOIN GRP_COMMENT C ON F.GRP_FEED_NO = C.GRP_FEED_NO WHERE F.GRP_NO = ${grpNo} AND F.GRP_FEED_SETTING = '전체 공개' GROUP BY F.GRP_FEED_NO, F.GRP_FEED_CONTENT, F.GRP_FEED_WD, F.GRP_FEED_SETTING, F.GRP_FEED_ID, M.PROFILE ORDER BY F.GRP_FEED_WD DESC

SELECT F.GRP_FEED_NO, F.GRP_FEED_CONTENT, F.GRP_FEED_WD, F.GRP_FEED_SETTING, F.GRP_FEED_ID, M.PROFILE, COUNT(C.GRP_FEED_NO) AS GRP_COMMENT_COUNT, COUNT(L.GRP_FEED_NO) AS GRP_FEED_LIKE_COUNT FROM GRP_FEED F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON F.GRP_FEED_ID = M.ID LEFT JOIN GRP_FEED_LIKE L ON F.GRP_FEED_NO = L.GRP_FEED_NO LEFT JOIN GRP_COMMENT C ON F.GRP_FEED_NO = C.GRP_FEED_NO WHERE F.GRP_NO = ${grpNo} GROUP BY F.GRP_FEED_NO, F.GRP_FEED_CONTENT, F.GRP_FEED_WD, F.GRP_FEED_SETTING, F.GRP_FEED_ID, M.PROFILE ORDER BY F.GRP_FEED_WD DESC

SELECT G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_IMAGE, GF.GRP_FEED_NO, GF.GRP_FEED_CONTENT, GF.GRP_FEED_WD, GF.GRP_FEED_SETTING, GF.GRP_FEED_ID, COUNT(GFL.GRP_FEED_NO) AS GRP_FEED_LIKE_COUNT, COUNT(GC.GRP_FEED_NO) AS GRP_COMMENT_COUNT FROM GRP G INNER JOIN GRP_FEED GF ON G.GRP_NO = GF.GRP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN GRP_FEED_LIKE GFL ON GF.GRP_FEED_NO = GFL.GRP_FEED_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN GRP_COMMENT GC ON GF.GRP_FEED_NO = GC.GRP_FEED_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER_GROUP MG ON G.GRP_NO = MG.GROUP_ID WHERE MG.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MG.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_IMAGE, GF.GRP_FEED_NO, GF.GRP_FEED_CONTENT, GF.GRP_FEED_WD, GF.GRP_FEED_SETTING, GF.GRP_FEED_ID ORDER BY GF.GRP_FEED_WD DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRP(GRP_NAME, GRP_LEADER, GRP_IMAGE, GRP_INTRO) VALUES(#{grpName}, #{grpLeader}, #{grpImage}, #{grpIntro})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GRP WHERE LOWER(GRP_NAME) = LOWER(#{grpName})

SELECT G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_IMAGE, G.GRP_MEMBER, G.GRP_VISIT, (SELECT STATUS FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND GROUP_ID = G.GRP_NO) AS GRP_STATUS, COUNT(F.GRP_NO) AS GRP_POST, G.GRP_ISOFFICIAL FROM GRP G LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_GROUP M ON G.GRP_NO = M.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GRP_FEED F ON G.GRP_NO = F.GRP_NO WHERE G.GRP_ISOFFICIAL = 1 GROUP BY G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_IMAGE, G.GRP_MEMBER, G.GRP_VISIT

SELECT G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_IMAGE, G.GRP_MEMBER, G.GRP_VISIT, (SELECT STATUS FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND GROUP_ID = G.GRP_NO) AS GRP_STATUS, COUNT(F.GRP_NO) AS GRP_POST, G.GRP_ISOFFICIAL FROM GRP G LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_GROUP M ON G.GRP_NO = M.GROUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GRP_FEED F ON G.GRP_NO = F.GRP_NO
WHERE LOWER(GRP_NAME) LIKE CONCAT ('%', LOWER(#{groupName}), '%')
GROUP BY G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_IMAGE, G.GRP_MEMBER, G.GRP_VISIT
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT G.GRP_NO, G.GRP_NAME, G.GRP_LEADER, G.GRP_IMAGE FROM GRP G, MEMBER_GROUP MG WHERE 1=1 AND G.GRP_NO = MG.GROUP_ID AND G.GRP_NO IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM MEMBER_GROUP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 1)
SELECT M.PROFILE FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG, MEMBER M WHERE MG.MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND MG.GROUP_ID = ${groupId} AND MG.STATUS = 1
SELECT MG.MEMBER_ID, M.PROFILE FROM MEMBER_GROUP MG, MEMBER M WHERE MG.MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND MG.GROUP_ID = ${groupId} AND MG.STATUS = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRP_FEED(GRP_NO, GRP_FEED_CONTENT, GRP_FEED_SETTING, GRP_FEED_ID) VALUES(${grpNo}, #{grpFeedContent}, #{grpFeedSetting}, #{grpFeedId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CARE_GRP WHERE GRP_NO = ${grpNo} ORDER BY CARE_GRP_FEED_WD DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARE_GRP(GRP_NO, CARE_GRP_TYPE, CARE_GRP_STARTDT, CARE_GRP_ENDDT, CARE_GRP_STARTTIME, CARE_GRP_ENDTIME, CARE_GRP_CHECK, CARE_GRP_CONTENT, CARE_GRP_FEED_SETTING, CARE_GRP_FEED_WRITER) VALUES(${grpNo}, #{careGrpType}, #{careGrpStartDt}, #{careGrpEndDt}, #{careGrpStartTime}, #{careGrpEndTime}, IF(#{careGrpType} = 'walk', #{careGrpCheck}, 'Unknown'), #{careGrpContent}, #{careGrpFeedSetting}, #{careGrpFeedWriter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CARE_GRP SET CARE_GRP_STARTDT = #{careGrpStartDt}, CARE_GRP_ENDDT = #{careGrpEndDt}, CARE_GRP_STARTTIME = #{careGrpStartTime}, CARE_GRP_ENDTIME = #{careGrpEndTime}, CARE_GRP_CHECK = COALESCE(#{careGrpCheck}, 'Unknown'), CARE_GRP_CONTENT = #{careGrpContent}, CARE_GRP_FEED_SETTING = #{careGrpFeedSetting} WHERE CARE_GRP_FEED_NO = ${careGrpFeedNo}
